name: Battle for Terrak
description:
Playtest script link: https://forms.gle/LDxhwiP6WGrrmQsY9

The High King of Terrak has been murdered by the Royal Court Mage! 

Now you, his son, seek revenge. 

Build and maintain your army to fight against warlords in real-time simulation strategy battles as you attempt to reclaim land and avenge your father in the Battle for Terrak.
